food.question: I am yellow and you peel me. Monkeys like to eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 I am a fruit monkeys love
💛 My color is yellow
⬇️ You need to peel me before you eat me

food.question: I am white and cold and yummy. You eat me with a spoon. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am very cold
🥄 You need a spoon to eat me
🍦 I am a yummy treat

food.question: I am round and red and juicy. Snow White ate one! What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 I grow on trees
👸 Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
🔴 I am the same color as a fire truck

food.question: I am orange and crunchy. Rabbits like to eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 Bugs Bunny likes me
🌱 I grow in the ground
🧡 I am the color of pumpkins

food.question: I am long and green. You can eat me in a salad. What am I?

hints.text: 🥗 I am good in a salad
🥒 I am long and green
🟢 I taste good with ranch

food.question: I am small and round, and I grow in bunches. I can be green or purple. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I am often used to make juice
🟢 I grow in a vineyard
💜 I come in different colors

food.question: I am made from milk and I can be hard or soft. Mice like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐭 Mice love to eat me
🐄 I am made from milk
🧀 I can be grated or sliced

food.question: I am brown and hard on the outside, but soft and white on the inside. You can drink my juice! What am I?

hints.text: 🌴 I grow on a tropical tree
🥥 I have water inside
🟤 I am brown and hairy

food.question: I am a vegetable with many layers, and I make you cry when you cut me. What am I?

hints.text: 😭 I can make you cry
🧅 I have many layers
💜 I can be white, yellow, or purple

food.question: I am a fruit with a big seed inside, and I am often used to make juice or jam. I can be many colors depending on type! What am I?

hints.text: 🍑 I have a big pit inside
💜 I can be used to make jelly
🌳 I grow on a tree and can be eaten raw

cosmos.question: I shine bright in the sky during the day. I give you warmth. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am very, very hot!
💛 I am big and yellow.
😎 You need sunglasses to look at me!

cosmos.question: I come out at night, and I'm big and round, sometimes you can only see a little piece of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌙 I am often white or grey.
🐺 Werewolves like me!
💧 I affect the ocean's tides.

cosmos.question: I twinkle at night, I am very far away, many of me form patterns in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I am small and bright.
🌃 You can see me best in the dark.
💫 I am made of hot gas.

cosmos.question: I am big and round, and you live on me! I have lots of water and land. What am I?

hints.text: 🌍 I am also called the world.
🌱 Plants grow on me.
💙 I am mostly blue when seen from space.

cosmos.question: I go around the Sun, I am red, and some robots have driven on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I am named after a Roman god of war.
🚀 People want to visit me!
💨 I have a very thin atmosphere.

cosmos.question: I am a group of many stars. I am so big, you cannot count how many stars are in me. What am I?

hints.text: ♾️ I am very, very big.
✨ I am often spiral-shaped.
🌌 Our Sun lives inside of me.

cosmos.question: I am a ball of ice and dust that flies through space and sometimes has a tail. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I am sometimes called a 'dirty snowball'.
🧊 The Sun's heat makes my tail.
🌠 I can be seen from Earth.

cosmos.question: I am a hot, glowing ball of gas that is much, much bigger than Earth. I light up our solar system. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ All planets orbit around me
🔥 I provide energy and light to Earth.
👑 I am at the center of our solar system.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a pattern. You can see these patterns at night. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 One well-known example looks like a bear.
🌌 I am smaller than a galaxy.
🌠 People have been using me to navigate for a long time.

cosmos.question: I am a group of planets, stars, moons, and other objects that all go around a big star. What am I?

hints.text: 🪐 I have eight main planets in mine.
🌞 Everything in it revolves around the sun.
✨ We live in one!
